bibl.title: The Bibliotheke Enkteseon and the Alienation of Real Securities in Roman Egypt.
bibl.note: Elaborates on some ideas presented at the 64th session of the Société Internationale d'Histoire du Droit de l'Antiquité "Fernand de Visscher" in Barcelona, in September 2010. - 1. Potestas alienandi. - 2. The bibliotheke enkteseon. - 3. Katoche and epistalma. - 4. The safeguard clause in the provincial parathesis requests. - 5. Notification of sale (ἐξοικονόμησις), a real security notwithstanding? - 6. Epistalma for a sale aimed at cancelling a real security? - 7. P. Gen. I 44.
